mapper.insert: insert into recommend_strategy (id, on_use, exp, level, difficulty, activity, device, num) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onUse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{device,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update recommend_strategy set on_use = #{onUse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exp = #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity = #{activity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device = #{device,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, on_use, exp, level, difficulty, activity, device, num from recommend_strategy where on_use = 1
select id, on_use, exp, level, difficulty, activity, device, num from recommend_strategy
